comments.creator: jdescottes@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Connecting to Firefox Preview Nightly fails with 
```
Error while calling actor 'root's method 'listTabs' can't access property "selectedBrowser", topAppWindow.gBrowser is undefined Actor.js:91:13
    writeError resource://devtools/shared/protocol/Actor.js:91
    handler resource://devtools/shared/protocol/Actor.js:187
```
https://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/rev/aec63591821712236a522f7f55116f582ed7c920/devtools/server/actors/descriptors/tab.js#96
